tool_description: It'll return words which are in same contextual group
name: Contextually Similar Words
title: Contextually Similar Words

api_list.name: Similar Words
api_list.description: Given a word it'll return a list of similar words, you can adjust the number of elements in list by using the count attribute
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://contextually-similar-words.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/word/similar"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "contextually-similar-words.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://contextually-similar-words.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/word/similar"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "contextually-similar-words.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
